explains: vt. 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权
vi. 取消抵押品赎回权

sentences.en: They tried to foreclose the possibility of his meeting with the chairman.
sentences.cn: 他们设法排除他与董事长会面的可能性。

sentences.en: To me, the easy way out of such dilemmas is to foreclose the tension.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，最简单的方法就是从这样的困境没收了紧张感。

sentences.en: Lenders of all stripes clearly prefer to foreclose on delinquent borrowers.
sentences.cn: 对于逾期不还贷的借款人，形形色色的放款人明显青睐没收他们的房产。
